description.value: An extension to provide a textual description of the type of medication (including relevant properties of the composition and preparation method if possible), which is only used if no coded indication from the G Standard is available (magistral preparation).

purpose.value: This extension represents the Description of [PharmaceuticalProduct](https://zibs.nl/wiki/PharmaceuticalProduct-v2.1.2(2020EN)) which is only used if no coded indication from the G Standard is available (magistral preparation).
